title: Running 10K As Fast As I Can!
description:
Running the San Silvestre Vallecana 10k Internacional race in Madrid on New Year's Eve 2024!
Happy new year everyone! Thank you for all your support over the years, looking forward to bringing you even more content in 2025! 

Save 10% site wide on training plans, hats, technical & casual apparel - (Code - YOUTUBE10) 
https://bit.ly/benparkesyoutube10

Check out:
Training Plans https://bit.ly/benparkesplans
Running Hats https://bit.ly/benparkeshats
Technical Gear https://bit.ly/benparkestechgear
Free Beginner Plans https://bit.ly/benparkesfreeplans
Shop out latest arrivals https://bit.ly/47MgROg

Follow me here:
Strava: https://www.strava.com/athletes/2310069
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/benparkes
Second channel https://www.youtube.com/@benparkestheextramile

📱For support enquiries or business enquiries, please go to: https://www.benparkes.com and use the chat function. 

⏰ Timecodes ⏰
0:00 Intro
2:42 Race start
3:45 First KM
5:51 5KM Split
7:08 The hill
8:08 Final KM and finish line
9:18 Race summary

About this video: Today we are in Madrid, to run the San Silvestre Vallecana 10k race which is the biggest running event in all of Spain and the 60th edition of this huge event!

This video is NOT sponsored. All products mentioned have been bought 100% by Ben and the channel. Our mission here is to help runners of all abilities improve and enjoy running to their full potential. Showcasing the best running tips and advice, while reviewing the latest gear and taking your round some of the best races in the world!

title: I Spent $10,000 on Running Shoes this year, these are the best ones...
description:

https://bit.ly/benparkesyoutube10

Training Plans https://bit.ly/benparkesplans
Running Hats https://bit.ly/benparkeshats
Technical Gear https://bit.ly/benparkestechgear
Free Beginner Plans https://bit.ly/benparkesfreeplans

📱For support enquiries or business enquiries, please go to: https://www.benparkes.com and use the chat function.

This video is NOT sponsored. All products mentioned have been bought 100% by Ben and the channel. Our mission here is to help runners of all abilities improve and enjoy running to their full potential. Showcasing the best running tips and advice, while reviewing the latest gear and taking your round some of the best races in the world!

title: How To Run Faster (WITHOUT RUNNING MORE)
description:
If you enjoyed the video, please like, comment and subscribe! Thank you for watching!

Save 10% site wide on training plans, hats, technical & casual apparel - (Code - YOUTUBE10) 
https://bit.ly/benparkesyoutube10

Check out:
Training Plans https://bit.ly/benparkesplans
Running Hats https://bit.ly/benparkeshats
Technical Gear https://bit.ly/benparkestechgear
Free Beginner Plans https://bit.ly/benparkesfreeplans
Shop out latest arrivals https://bit.ly/47MgROg

Free pacing chart download:
https://benparkes.com/blogs/news/pacing-your-runs-right-pace-chart?srsltid=AfmBOopiaDaRl0YAxtvG6G1aR6n8tUjVa-AA6suYw97QQnvD901eindy

Follow me here:
Strava: https://www.strava.com/athletes/2310069
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/benparkes
Second channel https://www.youtube.com/@benparkestheextramile

📱For support enquiries or business enquiries, please go to: https://www.benparkes.com and use the chat function. 

⏰ Timecodes ⏰
0:00 INTRO
0:25 IMPROVING YOUR RUNNING TECHNIQUE
0:44 Posture
0:58 Arms
1:10 Cadence
2:14 GIVE EACH RUN A PURPOSE
3:11 Example running 3x per week
3:45 Example running 4x per week
3:58 Example running 5x per week
4:50 Hill repeats
6:06 RECOVERY
7:18 CROSS TRAINING
10:07 STRENGTH TRAINING

About this video: Today we are going through how to improve your speed and become a fitter, faster, stronger runner without adding any more running miles to your training!

This video is NOT sponsored. All products mentioned have been bought 100% by Ben and the channel. Our mission here is to help runners of all abilities improve and enjoy running to their full potential. Showcasing the best running tips and advice, while reviewing the latest gear and taking your round some of the best races in the world!

title: HOW TO RUN A FASTER MARATHON - Training Tips for Running a PB/PR!
description:
If you enjoyed the video, please like, comment and subscribe! Thank you for watching!

Save 10% site wide on training plans, hats, technical & casual apparel - (Code - YOUTUBE10) 
https://bit.ly/benparkesyoutube10

Check out:
Training Plans https://bit.ly/benparkesplans
Running Hats https://bit.ly/benparkeshats
Technical Gear https://bit.ly/benparkestechgear
Free Beginner Plans https://bit.ly/benparkesfreeplans
Shop out latest arrivals https://bit.ly/47MgROg

Jack Daniels Race Time Predictor Calculator: https://vdoto2.com/calculator/
Gels review video: https://youtu.be/uJuZ29sTf2E?si=K6hbWWDwmXOYA-0Z

Follow me here:
Strava: https://www.strava.com/athletes/2310069
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/benparkes
Second channel https://www.youtube.com/@benparkestheextramile

📱For support enquiries or business enquiries, please go to: https://www.benparkes.com and use the chat function. 

⏰ Timecodes ⏰
0:00 Intro
0:35 Training
1:0 Choosing a goal race
1:34 Figuring out your goal time
2:31 How much mileage?
3:03 Long runs
6:38 Speed sessions
8:53 Strides
9:29 Easy runs
10:05 Strength training
10:46 Pacing the race
12:29 Marathon fuelling
15:16 Recovery & other

About this video: Today we are going through everything you need to know in order to improve your marathon time. We dive into the training you need to do with examples for a sub 5 hour marathon, a sub 4 hour marathon and a sub 3 hour marathon plus fuelling, hydration and pacing tips to run a stronger race!

This video is NOT sponsored. All products mentioned have been bought 100% by Ben and the channel. Our mission here is to help runners of all abilities improve and enjoy running to their full potential. Showcasing the best running tips and advice, while reviewing the latest gear and taking your round some of the best races in the world!

title: 10 MOST COMMON Running Mistakes (& how to fix them)
description:
If you enjoyed the video, please like, comment and subscribe! Thank you for watching!

Free Pacing Chart: https://benparkes.com/blogs/news/pacing-your-runs-right-pace-chart?srsltid=AfmBOoo-tMi657MOzYI9ufF9EjPVXyfSel-yHv38nWZiUH9MwBBhFeZY
Cadence Video https://youtu.be/eacl52qzr4E?si=1dPliCuRNeIgN9jz

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/benparkes

📱For support enquiries or business enquiries, please go to: https://www.benparkes.com and use the chat function. 

⏰ Timecodes ⏰
0:00 Intro
0:30 Not fuelling or hydrating properly
1:39 Running with bad technique
2:46 Neglecting strength training
3:52 Doing too much too soon
6:10 Ignoring pain
7:28 Running too fast
8:50 Skipping the warm up
9:57 Not taking rest days
10:53 Over analysing data
12:20 Comparing yourself to others

About this video: Here are the top 10 mistakes we see runners making all the time and how to avoid them!

This video is NOT sponsored. All products mentioned have been bought 100% by Ben and the channel. Our mission here is to help runners of all abilities improve and enjoy running to their full potential. Showcasing the best running tips and advice, while reviewing the latest gear and taking your round some of the best races in the world!

0:00 Intro

3:21 Puma MagMax Nitro

8:17 Brooks Glycerin Max
11:23 Hoka Skyward X
13:59 Asics Superblast 2
16:51 Nike Invincible

About this video: Here are my favourite max cushion running shoes on the market right now. All featuring a maximum stack height (ranging from 42mm to 48mm) for your easy runs and long runs! We go through the specifics for each shoe plus all of my likes and dislikes for each as well to help you choose the right one for you!

This video is NOT sponsored. All products mentioned have been bought 100% by Ben and the channel. Our mission here is to help runners of all abilities improve and enjoy running to their full potential. Showcasing the best running tips and advice, while reviewing the latest gear and taking your round some of the best races in the world!

About this video: Here is my simple 5 minute running drills routine that I do before every speed/interval session. These help get the body moving well to improve our running form and become stronger as well as getting us ready for the fast running coming up! They are very simple and easy to do for all abilities.

This video is NOT sponsored. All products mentioned have been bought 100% by Ben and the channel. Our mission here is to help runners of all abilities improve and enjoy running to their full potential. Showcasing the best running tips and advice, while reviewing the latest gear and taking your round some of the best races in the world!

turnover with this one you're trying to
bring your heels up towards your bum
underneath you rather than flecking your
heels behind you in terms of how long to
do this for you're looking for around
about 20 to 30 seconds beginners do this
one time intermediate two times and
advance three times with just a couple

we've got Carri ochre which is one
you'll see all of the footballers doing

around your hips and then for that
lateral movement helps improve our
stability and coordination too this one

once you've got the hang of it it's a
really good one you're stepping out to
the side with one leg and then the other
leg alternates between going in front

back side forward side back and then so
on walk through it a few times to get
the hang of it again we're going to be
doing this for around about 20 seconds

that one round beginners do this once
intermediate two rounds and advance
three rounds Right Moving on we're going
to be talking about the straight leg run
which is a great one for encouraging
that midfoot strike and gets the quads
nicely fired up too with this one you're
keeping your legs straight and kicking
them out in front of you what you want
to focus on here is trying to stay
upright and Tall avoid leaning too much
back on this one we also want the steps
to be quick and short throwing your foot
down into the ground again with this one
we're doing this for around about 20 to
30 seconds beginners one time
intermediate twice and Advance Runners
three times next up we have the walking
lunge and knee Drive these will really
help us open up the hips as well as
engaging our lower leg muscles it also
really helps to improve balance and
coordination since you're spending a bit
of time on one leg and that's all
important for running because we're
always on one leg so you're pulling your
knee up into your chest and then
stepping forward into a lunge bending
both knees around 90° if you do find
yourself a bit wobbly with these imagine
your feet are on train tracks rather
than one in front of the other and that
should help stabilize you a little bit
better performing these slowly will be a
lot better than rushing them I'd
recommend doing 10 in total with five on
each leg beginners do this one time
intermediates twice and advance three
times next up is those high knees an
absolute classic for a lot of us over
the years this is a great one to get
your calves glutes and hamstrings firing
while promoting that good knee lift and
it also encourages a quick turnover as
well this one is quite similar to butt
kicks the one we did at the beginning
but the focus is bringing the knees High
rather than heels to butt also trying to
maintain a nice tall posture when doing
these and again we do not want to be
leaning back here you'll see a bit of PN
with this one because again we're doing
this for around about 20 to 30 seconds
beginners once intermediate twice and
advance three times okay five down and
one to go the final one is the strides
I'd say this is the most fun one we get
to start running and running pretty fast
as well this is the one to do now all of
our muscles have woken up the heart rate
is elevated nicely and this is a good
one to finish with these are essentially
20 second bursts of running around about
90 to 95% effort these will really help
improve our Cadence increase our stride
length and get those fast twitch muscle
fibers working the main focus here is
running fast but also staying in control
and relaxed at the same time this is not
an allout Sprint I like to roll into
these gradually so it takes me about 5
seconds or so to hit that top speed and
then hold that for around about 10 to 15
seconds before gradually slowing down
again take a short rest between each one
just to get your breath back beginners 2
to 3 * 20 seconds intermediate 3 to 4 *
20 seconds and advanced Runners 4 to 5
by 20 seconds right I'm now warmed up
I've done my drills and I'm ready to go

you found that useful and can integrate

questions let me know down in the

⏰ Timecodes ⏰
0:00 Intro
0:51 Alphafly 3 vs Alphafly 2
1:29 Facts and figures
2:44 Likes
7:01 Dislikes
8:02 Building a shoe rotation
8:57 Final thoughts

About this video: How long do supershoes last? Well today we're seeing how the Nike Alphafly 3 is holding up after 200 miles of training and 2 marathon races. Is it just for elite runners or can regular runners benefit from them too? We’re answering all that and more in my full 100% honest review!

This video is NOT sponsored. All products mentioned have been bought 100% by Ben and the channel. Our mission here is to help runners of all abilities improve and enjoy running to their full potential. Showcasing the best running tips and advice, while reviewing the latest gear and taking your round some of the best races in the world!

title: The Most Comfortable Daily Shoe EVER? (New Balance 1080 v14 Honest Review)
description:
If you enjoyed the video, please like, comment and subscribe! Thank you for watching!

Rest Day sweater https://benparkes.com/collections/23-sweaters/products/rest-day-embroidered-sweater-3

📱For support enquiries or business enquiries, please go to: https://www.benparkes.com and use the chat function. 

⏰ Timecodes ⏰
0:00 Intro
1:14 What's changed
1:59 Facts and figures
3:25 Likes
5:40 Dislikes
6:57 1080 v14 vs Asics Novablast 4
8:04 1080 v14 vs More v5
9:29 Final thoughts

About this video: Today we're reviewing the New Balance Fresh Foam X 1080v14. We talk about all the changes from the outgoing v13, all of the stats, my likes and dislikes and some comparisons against my favourite daily trainer (the Asics Novablast 4) and the ultra plush max stack New Balance More v5.

This video is NOT sponsored. All products mentioned have been bought 100% by Ben and the channel. Our mission here is to help runners of all abilities improve and enjoy running to their full potential. Showcasing the best running tips and advice, while reviewing the latest gear and taking your round some of the best races in the world!

title: FINALLY Running The Melbourne Marathon... this was UNREAL!
description:
If you enjoyed the video, please like, comment and subscribe! Thank you for watching!

Save 10% site wide on training plans, hats, technical & casual apparel - (Code - YOUTUBE10) 
https://bit.ly/benparkesyoutube10

Check out:
Training Plans https://bit.ly/benparkesplans
Running Hats https://bit.ly/benparkeshats
Technical Gear https://bit.ly/benparkestechgear
Free Beginner Plans https://bit.ly/benparkesfreeplans
Shop our latest arrivals https://bit.ly/47MgROg

Follow me here:
Strava: https://www.strava.com/athletes/2310069
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/benparkes
Second channel https://www.youtube.com/@benparkestheextramile

Strava from the race: https://www.strava.com/activities/12640708470
Inside Running Podcast: https://insiderunningpodcast.com/

Links to products featured in the video (use code YOUTUBE10 for 10% off)
Green beanie https://benparkes.com/collections/23-winter-hat/products/2023-gettingitdone-beanie-hat
Matte black cap https://benparkes.com/collections/23-trucker/products/proelite-hat
Red long sleeve https://benparkes.com/collections/23-long-sleeves/products/getting-it-done-long-sleeve-running-tee-3
Soar elite singlet https://benparkes.com/collections/23-singlets/products/soar-elite-singlet
Wrap https://benparkes.com/collections/23-wraps/products/ben-parkes-waves-wrap
Rest Day sweater https://benparkes.com/collections/23-sweaters/products/rest-day-embroidered-sweater-3
Sunrise Long Sleeve https://benparkes.com/collections/23-long-sleeves/products/long-sleeve-running-tee-5

📱For support enquiries or business enquiries, please go to: https://www.benparkes.com and use the chat function. 

⏰ Timecodes ⏰
0:00 Intro
0:12 Albert parkrun
2:58 expo
5:12 race morning
6:28 race start
8:03 5k
9:00 10k
11:14 half marathon
12:18 30k
13:22 40k
14:09 finish
15:58 final thoughts

About this video: We're in Australia for the Melbourne marathon festival, one of Australia's best marathons and one I've been wanting to do for so long, finishing inside the MCG is a dream come true! Follow along for the vlog of the whole weekend including going to parkrun, the expo and then of course taking you around with me for the race itself! 

This video is NOT sponsored. All products mentioned have been bought 100% by Ben and the channel. Our mission here is to help runners of all abilities improve and enjoy running to their full potential. Showcasing the best running tips and advice, while reviewing the latest gear and taking your round some of the best races in the world!

About this video: It's the Berlin marathon 2024! The 50th edition of this iconic World Marathon Major event! Follow along for the vlog of the whole weekend including the expo, my goals for the race, going through all of my kit I'm using and then of course taking you with me for the race itself! 

This video is NOT sponsored. All products mentioned have been bought 100% by Ben and the channel. Our mission here is to help runners of all abilities improve and enjoy running to their full potential. Showcasing the best running tips and advice, while reviewing the latest gear and taking your round some of the best races in the world!

title: 6 Best Shoes For LONG RUNS (from cheapest to most expensive)
description:
If you enjoyed the video, please like, comment and subscribe! Thank you for watching!

Save 10% site wide on training plans, hats, technical & casual apparel - (Code - YOUTUBE10) 
https://bit.ly/benparkesyoutube10

Training Plans https://bit.ly/benparkesplans
Running Hats https://bit.ly/benparkeshats
Technical Gear https://bit.ly/benparkestechgear
Free Beginner Plans https://bit.ly/benparkesfreeplans
Shop out latest arrivals https://bit.ly/47MgROg

Follow me here:
Strava: https://www.strava.com/athletes/2310069
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/benparkes
Second channel https://www.youtube.com/@benparkestheextramile

📱For support enquiries or business enquiries, please go to: https://www.benparkes.com and use the chat function. 

⏰ Timecodes ⏰
0:00 Intro
0:39 Puma Velocity Nitro 3
2:33 Asics Novablast 4
4:27 Brooks Ghost Max 2
6:46 Hoka Skyward X
8:42 Asics Superblast 2
11:06 New Balance SC Trainer v3
13:31 Final thoughts

About this video: After testing out a wide selection of long run shoes this year, these are my top shoes at every budget. We go through my likes and dislikes for each plus all the stats and who they are best suited to. 

This video is NOT sponsored. All products mentioned have been bought 100% by Ben and the channel. Our mission here is to help runners of all abilities improve and enjoy running to their full potential. Showcasing the best running tips and advice, while reviewing the latest gear and taking your round some of the best races in the world!

About this video: Here is my review of the Hoka Skyward X which is currently the best rated running shoe on the Hoka website. We'll go through what's changed between this and the old Bondi X, all of the facts and figures (including its huge stack height!), what I liked and didn't like and my final thoughts at the end.

This video is NOT sponsored. All products mentioned have been bought 100% by Ben and the channel. Our mission here is to help runners of all abilities improve and enjoy running to their full potential. Showcasing the best running tips and advice, while reviewing the latest gear and taking your round some of the best races in the world!

into this panic mode in the night before

super boring is the best thing we can do
in this situation no new shoes no new
clothing no new gels no new breakfast if
you are in any doubt at all about what
sort of shoes and what gear to go go
with the most comfortable ones running
for three four or 5 hours is a hell of a
long time you don't want to go with

give you some issues and be
uncomfortable even if you feel like it's

If you enjoyed the video, please like, comment and subscribe! Thank you for watching!

New Balance SC Trainer v3 Review https://youtu.be/faBxMeg0-HQ?si=su_-Sq-1O9PAwtNv

⏰ Timecodes ⏰
0:00 Intro
0:43 Stats
2:10 Likes
4:03 How they’re holding up
4:58 Dislikes
6:16 Superblast alternatives
6:52 Mizuno Neo Vista
7:52 Hoka Skyward X
9:22 Asics Novablast 4
10:15 New Balance SC Trainer v3
11:16 Final thoughts

About this video: Today we are checking in to see how well the Superblast 2 is performing after 350 miles. As usual we go through all the facts and figures, my likes and dislikes as well as some alternatives to the Superblast which you might want to consider instead!

This video is NOT sponsored. All products mentioned have been bought 100% by Ben and the channel. Our mission here is to help runners of all abilities improve and enjoy running to their full potential. Showcasing the best running tips and advice, while reviewing the latest gear and taking your round some of the best races in the world!

🧢 Kit from the video with fast worldwide shipping:

New Balance Rebel v4 review https://youtu.be/-TVWTynvAdc?si=bBupntpfz-AerEgg
Mizuno Neo Vista review https://youtu.be/jqO_cXFKwFY?si=UKzXm-xLrWgXRog8

⏰ Timecodes ⏰
0:00 Intro
0:38 What's new?
1:34 Stats
3:36 Likes
5:49 Dislikes
7:21 Alternatives
7:57 Final thoughts

About this video: Today we are reviewing the New Balance Fuelcell SuperComp Trainer v3, a shoe aimed at long runs and runners training for half marathons and marathons. We'll talk about the differences between this and the old model, go through all the facts and figures, my likes and dislikes as well as some comparisons with similar shoes on the market to help you figure out what's best for you!

This video is NOT sponsored. All products mentioned have been bought 100% by Ben and the channel. Our mission here is to help runners of all abilities improve and enjoy running to their full potential. Showcasing the best running tips and advice, while reviewing the latest gear and taking your round some of the best races in the world!

title: I Spent £700 On Running Influencer Products... (my HONEST thoughts)
description:
If you enjoyed the video, please like, comment and subscribe! Thank you for watching!

Save 10% on training plans, hats, technical & casual apparel - (Code - YOUTUBE10) 
https://bit.ly/benparkesyoutube10

Check out:
Training Plans https://bit.ly/benparkesplans
Running Hats https://bit.ly/benparkeshats
Technical Gear https://bit.ly/benparkestechgear
Free Beginner Plans https://bit.ly/benparkesfreeplans

Follow me here:
Strava: https://www.strava.com/athletes/2310069
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/benparkes
Second channel https://www.youtube.com/@benparkestheextramile

Today we are reviewing 5 of the most popular running influencer products on the market at the moment. With so many influencers and athletes plugging these products recently, I was curious to give them a go myself to see if they were actually any good.

I bought these things 100% with my own money to give you a completely unbiased and honest review of them. Thanks so much to everyone who watches these videos, likes, comments, subscribes and checks out www.benparkes.com which enables us to bring these reviews to you!

🧢 Kit from the video with fast worldwide shipping:
🩶 Rest Day Sweater https://benparkes.com/collections/23-sweaters/products/rest-day-embroidered-sweater-3
🖤 Matte Black Cap https://benparkes.com/collections/23-all-hats/products/proelite-hat

📱For support enquiries or business enquiries, please go to: https://www.benparkes.com and use the chat function. 

⏰ Timecodes ⏰
0:00 Intro
1:09 Puresport muscle balm
3:59 Pillar Performance triple magnesium powder
7:18 Therabody Theragun mini 2 massage gun
11:54 Shokz OpenRun Pro running headphones
15:34 Sungod Ultras running sunglasses
19:53 Outro

About this video: Today we are reviewing products from Puresport, Pillar Performance, Therabody, Shokz (Aftershokz) and SunGod. I wanted to see if these products would improve my running or recovery in any way or if it’s all just really good influencer marketing! We'll go through what each product is for, my likes and dislikes plus some alternatives and my overall rating.

This video is NOT sponsored. All products mentioned have been bought 100% by Ben and the channel. Our mission here is to help runners of all abilities improve and enjoy running to their full potential. Showcasing the best running tips and advice, while reviewing the latest gear and taking your round some of the best races in the world!

Showcasing the best running tips and advice, while reviewing the latest gear and taking your round some of the best races in the world!

About this video: Today we are going through everything you need to know in order to improve your half marathon time. We dive into the training you need to do with examples for a sub 2 hour half, a sub 1h45 half and a sub 1h30 half plus effective interval sessions and pacing tips to run a faster half marathon race!

This video is NOT sponsored. All products mentioned have been bought 100% by Ben and the channel. Our mission here is to help runners of all abilities improve and enjoy running to their full potential. Showcasing the best running tips and advice, while reviewing the latest gear and taking your round some of the best races in the world!

title: HOW TO RUN A FASTER 10K - Training Tips to get a Personal Best!
description:
If you enjoyed the video, please like, comment and subscribe! Thank you for watching!

Save 10% on training plans, hats, technical & casual apparel - (Code - YOUTUBE10) 
https://bit.ly/benparkesyoutube10

Check out:
Training Plans https://bit.ly/benparkesplans
Running Hats https://bit.ly/benparkeshats
Technical Gear https://bit.ly/benparkestechgear
Free Beginner Plans https://bit.ly/benparkesfreeplans

Follow me here:
Strava: https://www.strava.com/athletes/2310069
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/benparkes
Second channel https://www.youtube.com/@benparkestheextramile

Welcome to the ultimate guide on how to crush your 10K PB (or PR!) with training tips, race tactics, and speed secrets to help you run faster and stronger than ever before!

🔥 Download a 10k training plan for your next race! ➡️ https://benparkes.com/collections/10-km

🎥 Watch this video next: 
⏱️ Sub 40 Minute 10k Tips WHILE Running a Sub 40 Minute 10k https://youtu.be/1VJRE-aCyXA?si=EkFpg5NiEprvHM2z

🧢 Kit from the video with fast worldwide shipping:
Gradient Tee https://benparkes.com/collections/23-short-sleeves/products/gettingitdone-running-tee-15
OG Cap https://benparkes.com/collections/23-trucker/products/og-running-cap

📱For support enquiries or business enquiries, please go to: https://www.benparkes.com and use the chat function. 

⏰ Timecodes ⏰
0:00 Intro
0:35 How long to train?
1:31 Some fast 10k race options
1:43 What time are you capable of?
2:31 Intervals
4:18 Example speed sessions
7:19 Strides
8:32 Long runs and easy runs
9:38 Race day tactics
10:04 Pacing strategies
10:54 Fuelling and hydration
11:30 Watch set up

About this video: Today we are going through everything you need to know in order to improve your 10k time. We dive into the training you need to do with examples for a sub 60 minute 10k, a sub 50 minute 10k and a sub 40 minute 10k plus effective interval sessions and pacing tips to run a faster 10k race!

This video is NOT sponsored. All products mentioned have been bought 100% by Ben and the channel. Our mission here is to help runners of all abilities improve and enjoy running to their full potential. Showcasing the best running tips and advice, while reviewing the latest gear and taking your round some of the best races in the world!

title: Best ALL TERRAIN Running Shoes - Reviewing Nike/Hoka/Salomon options!
description:
If you enjoyed the video, please like, comment and subscribe! Thank you for watching!

Save 10% on training plans, hats, technical & casual apparel - (Code - YOUTUBE10) 
https://bit.ly/benparkesyoutube10

Check out:
Training Plans https://bit.ly/benparkesplans
Running Hats https://bit.ly/benparkeshats
Technical Gear https://bit.ly/benparkestechgear
Free Beginner Plans https://bit.ly/benparkesfreeplans

Follow me here:
Strava: https://www.strava.com/athletes/2310069
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/benparkes
Second channel https://www.youtube.com/@benparkestheextramile

Here are my top 3 best "Road To Trail" shoes (sometimes known as hybrid shoes) on the market right now... perfect for running on light trails or those runs where you have a bit of tarmac to run on and some off-road sections too! 

🔥 Nike Trail Comparison Review Video ➡️ https://youtu.be/UxBarBR-3u4?si=5wMD35IWXDVm-5Qw

🎥 Watch this video next: 
🌳 Trail running for beginners https://youtu.be/8JAJT0A2CxQ?si=LJW_QMIDTdDA83Qj

🧢 Kit from the video with fast worldwide shipping:
🩶 Rest Day Embroidered Sweater https://benparkes.com/collections/23-sweaters/products/rest-day-embroidered-sweater-3
Getting It Done Cap Coming Soon ⏰

🌍 Links from the video:
👟 Nike Pegasus 41 Review https://youtu.be/xi7HLGddq8g?si=Ngg1IfloAIr_C0zC

⏰ Timecodes ⏰
0:00 Intro
1:14 Nike Pegasus Trail 5
4:25 Hoka Challenger 7
6:39 Salomon Sense Ride 5
9:23 Summary
9:27 Most comfortable
9:30 Best for long runs
9:38 Best grip
9:44 Best for speed
9:54 Best overall

About this video: In this video, we review the top 3 road to trail running shoes: Nike Trail 5, Hoka Challenger 7, and Salomon Sense Ride 5. Whether you're a beginner looking to explore trail running or need reliable shoes for varied terrain, we cover the pros and cons of each option. Find out which hybrid shoe offers the best comfort, grip, and overall performance. Perfect for runners who want the best of both worlds in their footwear!

This video is NOT sponsored. All products mentioned have been bought 100% by Ben and the channel. Our mission here is to help runners of all abilities improve and enjoy running to their full potential. Showcasing the best running tips and advice, while reviewing the latest gear and taking your round some of the best races in the world!

title: How to Run Fast at a Low Heart Rate
description:
If you enjoyed the video, please like, comment and subscribe! Thank you for watching!

Save 10% on training plans, hats, technical & casual apparel - (Code - YOUTUBE10) 
https://bit.ly/benparkesyoutube10

Check out:
Training Plans https://bit.ly/benparkesplans
Running Hats https://bit.ly/benparkeshats
Technical Gear https://bit.ly/benparkestechgear
Free Beginner Plans https://bit.ly/benparkesfreeplans

Follow me here:
Strava: https://www.strava.com/athletes/2310069
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/benparkes
Second channel https://www.youtube.com/@benparkestheextramile

If you struggle to keep your heart rate low on your easy runs, this one is for you! We know how frustrating it can be, so today we're going through how to properly calculate your heart rate zones plus loads of tips on how you can keep your pace in check and eventually be running faster at a lower heart rate!

🔥 Watch more running tips videos with our Running Tips Playlist! ➡️ https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PL6WDRTAtxhnZdCXHEx5fO6lyFlYHFk0-2&si=mUM4MR2I_TgtWKa6

🎥 Watch this video next: 
 🏃 How To Improve Your Cadence https://youtu.be/eacl52qzr4E?si=lAvyKxeZg8Wu34zT

🧢 Kit from the video with fast worldwide shipping:
🖤 Left Foot, Right Foot Tee https://benparkes.com/collections/23-casual-tees/products/left-foot-right-foot-tee-1
🖤 Matte Black Cap https://benparkes.com/collections/23-trucker/products/proelite-hat

📱For support inquires or business inquiries, please go to: https://www.benparkes.com and use the chat function. 

🌍 Links from the video:
Jack Daniels Pacing Calculator: https://vdoto2.com/calculator/
Heart Rate Zones Calculator: https://www.calculatorsoup.com/calculators/health/target-heart-rate-zone-calculator.php
Garmin Heart Rate Monitor: https://www.garmin.com/en-GB/p/770963
Wahoo Tickr Heart Rate Monitor: https://uk.wahoofitness.com/devices/heart-rate-monitors/trackr-heart-rate-buy?gad_source=1&gclid=Cj0KCQjwhb60BhClARIsABGGtw-33fqK6rpeG79Qm5_MFQawMe9APecXYYg8OMh6Dbb79Au6EEjjgqYaAjcJEALw_wcB
Polar OH1 Arm Band: https://www.polar.com/uk-en/sensors/oh1-optical-heart-rate-sensor

⏰ Timecodes ⏰
0:00 Intro
0:34 How Slow Should Your Easy Runs Be?
1:08 How To Calculate Your Heart Rate Training Zones for Running
6:40 Practicing Low Heart Rate Zone 2 Running
8:55 Factors Affecting Heart Rate
10:19 How To Improve Your Running Form

About this video: Follow along today as we talk about mastering the art of easy running and zone 2 training to build a strong aerobic base and improve running efficiency.

This video is NOT sponsored. All products mentioned have been bought 100% by Ben and the channel. Our mission here is to help runners of all abilities improve and enjoy running to their full potential. Showcasing the best running tips and advice, while reviewing the latest gear and taking your round some of the best races in the world!

title: ASICS SUPERBLAST 2 (completely unbiased review)
description:
If you enjoyed the video, please like, comment and subscribe! Thank you for watching!

Save 10% on training plans, hats, technical & casual apparel - (Code - YOUTUBE10) 
https://bit.ly/benparkesyoutube10

Check out:
Training Plans https://bit.ly/benparkesplans
Running Hats https://bit.ly/benparkeshats
Technical Gear https://bit.ly/benparkestechgear
Free Beginner Plans https://bit.ly/benparkesfreeplans

Follow me here:
Strava: https://www.strava.com/athletes/2310069
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/benparkes
Second channel https://www.youtube.com/@benparkestheextramile

The highly anticipated Asics Superblast 2 is here! The original model is one of my all time favourite shoes so I was a bit worried to see how Asics could possibly improve upon it. There are quite a few big updates, but are they all for the better? Here is my review!

🎽Kit from the video with fast worldwide shipping:
🧢 OG Cap https://benparkes.com/collections/23-trucker/products/og-running-cap
🧢 Flame Orange Cap https://benparkes.com/products/running-cap-1
👕 Rest Day Embroidered Sweater https://benparkes.com/collections/23-sweaters/products/rest-day-embroidered-sweater-3
👕 Summer Technicolour Tee https://benparkes.com/products/gettingitdone-running-tee-19 

📱For support inquiries or business inquiries, please go to: https://www.benparkes.com and use the chat function.

⏰ Timecodes ⏰
0:00 Intro
0:45 What's changed?
1:57 Facts & figures
4:17 Likes
6:32 Dislikes
8:06 Superblast 2 vs Asics Novablast 4
8:57 Superblast 2 vs Mizuno Neo Vista
9:50 Superblast 2 vs Nike Invincible 3
10:21 Final thoughts

About this video: Today we are reviewing the Asics Superblast 2 road running shoe. We'll talk about the differences between the old model, go through all the stats, my likes and dislikes as well as comparing against other popular and similar shoes from Nike, Mizuno and Asics.

This video is NOT sponsored. All products mentioned have been bought 100% by Ben and the channel. Our mission here is to help runners of all abilities improve and enjoy running to their full potential. Showcasing the best running tips and advice, while reviewing the latest gear and taking your round some of the best races in the world!

This video is NOT sponsored. All products mentioned have been bought 100% by Ben and the channel. Our mission here is to help runners of all abilities improve and enjoy running to their full potential. Showcasing the best running tips and advice, while reviewing the latest gear and taking your round some of the best races in the world!

About this video: Today we’ve got loads of budget-friendly running tips from where to buy affordable running wear, the best cheap running shoes and how to run races for free! So if you’re on a tight budget or just looking at some ways you can save some money whilst still enjoying this amazing sport then this one’s for you!

This video is NOT sponsored. All products mentioned have been bought 100% by Ben and the channel. Showcasing the best running tips and advice, while reviewing the latest gear and taking your round some of the best races in the world!

title: COUNTDOWN TO THE BOSTON MARATHON!
description:
A pre-race vlog getting ready to run the iconic Boston Marathon! Heading to the expo to pick up my bib, a few shakeout runs, plus discussing kit & goals for the race!

🔥 Visit us at the London Marathon Expo this week! ➡️ https://www.tcslondonmarathon.com/the-event/the-running-show

⭐️ Check out the best training plans, running hats and apparel with worlwide shipping now:! http://www.benparkes.com - use code YOUTUBE for 10% off your order! 

🧢 Kit from the video with fast worldwide shipping:
🩶 Rest Day Sweater https://benparkes.com/collections/23-sweaters/products/rest-day-embroidered-sweater-3 
🖤 Matte Black Cap https://benparkes.com/collections/23-all-hats/products/proelite-hat

Follow my training on Strava
https://www.strava.com/athletes/2310069

My second channel 
https://www.youtube.com/@benparkestheextramile

My Instagram
https://www.instagram.com/benparkes

All My Links
https://linkpop.com/benparkes

Want help with your running to become a better, faster, stronger, happier runner?
⚡️COMPLETLY FREE beginner training plans - get them here: https://benparkes.com/collections/free-beginner-plans
⚡️5 STAR RATED Training plans with proven results - get them here: https://benparkes.com/collections/plans
⚡️The very best running hats - run better here: https://benparkes.com/collections/23-all-hats
⚡️Top quality running singlets and tees - get them here: https://benparkes.com/collections/23-running-gear-all

📱For Support inquires, or Business inquiries, please go to: https://www.benparkes.com and use the chat function. 

🌍 Links from the video:
Check out Eric's channel https://www.youtube.com/@flobergruns

⏰ Timecodes ⏰
0:00 Intro
0:56 First run in Boston
1:35 Visiting the Expo
6:28 Goals/expectations for race day
7:46 Shakeout run with Eric Floberg
9:10 Race day kit

About this video: We're in Boston getting ready to run the marathon on Monday! In today's video we go for a little jog to explore the city, head to the expo to pick up my race bib, head out on a shakeout run with fellow YouTuber Eric Floberg and chat about my goals and kit for the race!

This video is NOT sponsored. All products mentioned have been bought 100% by Ben and the channel. Our mission here is to help runners of all abilities improve and enjoy running to their full potential. Showcasing the best running tips and advice, while reviewing the latest gear and taking your round some of the best races in the world!

title: MY MARATHON RACE DAY ROUTINE (from start to finish)
description:
Race day can be quite overwhelming and nerve-wracking but here is my simple step by step guide to everything that you can expect to happen on the day! This is my full race day schedule from beginning to end.

🔥 Never forget anything for your race again! Download our FREE race day checklist ➡️ https://benparkes.com/blogs/news/race-day-checklist

⭐️Check out the best training plans, running hats and apparel with worlwide shipping now:! http://www.benparkes.com - use code YOUTUBE for 10% off your order! 

🎥 Watch this video next: 
🧠 Mental tricks to run faster and longer https://youtu.be/A4Fouk1Yg9M?si=txXxKp4U5YVUvS1D

👟 Kit from the video with fast worldwide shipping:
👕 Rest Day Tee https://benparkes.com/collections/23-casual-tees/products/rest-day-tee-3
🧢 Thames Cap https://benparkes.com/collections/23-trucker/products/gettingitdone-running-cap

Follow my training on Strava
https://www.strava.com/athletes/2310069

My second channel 
https://www.youtube.com/@benparkestheextramile

My Instagram
https://www.instagram.com/benparkes

All My Links
https://linkpop.com/benparkes

My Current Gear List

Want help with your running to become a better, faster, stronger, happier runner?
⚡️COMPLETLY FREE beginner training plans - get them here: https://benparkes.com/collections/free-beginner-plans
⚡️5 STAR RATED Training plans with proven results - get them here: https://benparkes.com/collections/plans
⚡️The very best running hats - run better here: https://benparkes.com/collections/23-all-hats
⚡️Top quality running singlets and tees - get them here: https://benparkes.com/collections/23-running-gear-all

📱For Support inquires, or Business inquiries, please go to: https://www.benparkes.com and use the chat function. 

⏰ Timecodes ⏰
0:00 Intro
0:25 2-3 hours before race start
2:32 1-2 hours before race start
3:01 1 hour to go
4:12 30 minutes to go
5:34 5 minutes to go
5:55 Start
6:35 30 Minutes into the race
7:31 Half way
8:18 Final 6 miles
9:27 Finish line
10:16 Later that day

About this video: Welcome to our step by step guide to marathon day! We chat about everything that happens on race day from the time your alarm goes off in the morning all the way through until you go to bed again at night. We'll cover when to have your breakfast, travelling to the start line, race day strategies, mental tricks for when it gets tough, kit essentials, how to handle race day nerves, plus nutrition tips and generally what to expect throughout the day so whether you're running your first marathon or your 50th, you can keep stress to a minimum and concentrate on having a successful run!

This video is NOT sponsored. All products mentioned have been bought 100% by Ben and the channel. Our mission here is to help runners of all abilities improve and enjoy running to their full potential. Showcasing the best running tips and advice, while reviewing the latest gear and taking your round some of the best races in the world!

About this video: The Hoka Mach 6 review is here and there are some big changes from the outgoing Mach 5. The Mach 6 is an everyday road running shoe for all distances geared towards those slightly faster runs like your tempo sessions or anything where you want to pick up the pace a little bit. The Mach is one of Hoka's most popular models so follow along today as I give you all the facts and figures, my thoughts about the shoe and all the differences between this and the Hoka Mach 5. Is it worth the upgrade?

This video is NOT sponsored. All products mentioned have been bought 100% by Ben and the channel. Our mission here is to help runners of all abilities improve and enjoy running to their full potential. Showcasing the best running tips and advice, while reviewing the latest gear and taking your round some of the best races in the world!

About this video: The New Balance Rebel v4 review is here! An everyday road running shoe for all distances. Super cushioned, lightweight and is said to be one of the best road running shoes of 2024. Follow along today as I give you all my thoughts about the shoe, the differences from the previous version and how it compares to some other models as well.

This video is NOT sponsored. All products mentioned have been bought 100% by Ben and the channel. Our mission here is to help runners of all abilities improve and enjoy running to their full potential. Showcasing the best running tips and advice, while reviewing the latest gear and taking your round some of the best races in the world!
